SEARCH
Package com.mycompany.main

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.main.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
CarefulPlayer, GreedyPlayer, TacticalPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
The Player class serves as an abstract representation of a player in the board game. It manages the player's name, balance, properties, position on the board, and transaction handling.

    • move

      protected void move(int diceRoll, List<Field> board)
      Moves the player based on the result of a dice roll. The new position is calculated and the player interacts with the field they land on.
      Parameters:
      diceRoll - the result of the dice roll
      board - the list of fields on the game board

    • handleFieldInteraction

      protected abstract void handleFieldInteraction(Field field)
      Handles the interaction of the player with the field they land on. This method is abstract and must be implemented by subclasses.
      Parameters:
      field - the field that the player lands on

    • playTurn

      public abstract void playTurn(int diceRoll, List<Field> board)
      Executes the player's turn based on the result of a dice roll. This method is abstract and must be implemented by subclasses.
      Parameters:
      diceRoll - the result of the dice roll
      board - the list of fields on the game board
